description:
Modular crampons for stepping up to steep ice and mixed lines. Swappable front points can be configured as dual or mono-point, long or short, at set with as much asymmetry as you like. They include 2 types of interchangeable front bindings to adapt to boots with or without toe welts. So they are pretty much the most adjustable, modular, versatile crampon available for ice and mixed climbing.

  • Leverlock system includes 2 interchangeable front attachment bindings for boots with a front welt (Fil systen) and those without (Fil Flex)
  • Heel bail design fits boots with a heel welt and has a thumb catch for easy removal
  • Front points adjust with a single screw
  • Anti-snow plates included to prevent snow build-up on approaches and descents
name: Petzl Lynx Leverlock Universal Crampons
